titlestmt.titleproper: Henry Luce Foundation records, Record Group 10, Accession 2019:126
A Guide to the Henry Luce Foundation records, Record Group 10, Accession 2019:126 FA1730

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:55:52 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Henry Luce Foundation records, Record Group 10, Accession 2019:126

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. Access copy currently unavailable. Please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Henry Luce Foundation records (Record Group 10) consists primarily of grant files.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC holds legal title. The Henry Luce Foundation retains all applicable intellectual property rights in so far as it holds them.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Henry Luce Foundation records (Record Group 10) are arranged as received.
